thread.title: Hillary Clinton Makes Surprise Visit Outside Las Vegas Hotel
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton Makes Surprise Visit Outside Las Vegas Hotel - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Hillary Clinton Makes Surprise Visit Outside Las Vegas Hotel
text: During a labor protest on Monday afternoon, just outside of the Trump International Hotel in Las Vegas, Nevada, Hillary Clinton made a surprise visit to blast Donald Trump, alongside hotel workers and activists fighting for unionization. Huffington Post reports that Clinton, who is in Las Vegas for the Democratic presidential debate, joined hotel employees, along...
